divs: Sighting DetailsIn addition to a very fast UFO at about the 32-34 second mark (noticed by someone else), there is a flash of red light coming from the back of the helicopter (seemingly aimed at the person filming) at the 29 second mark. It's a quick flash and you'll need to watch the video frame by frame to see it. It appears to be a laser-like flash or the chopper's occupants were returning the favor by taking a photo of the person filming them. Better that scenario than them taking "aim" at him through a lighted scope!
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Ashland
There was one other sighting in Ashland on or around March 30th 2012
